TILE.name: Batched Orders
TILE.where: (lower(order_status) = lower('Processing Order') AND batch_no is not null )

GRID.name: Batched Orders
GRID.where: (lower(order_status) = lower('Processing Order') AND batch_no is not null )

FORM.name: Update Personal Info
FORM.COMBOLIST: function_role Master Account Manager Agency User Consultant

FORMVIEW.name: Update Contact Details
FORMVIEW.gohint: Click on GO to edit your details of change travel agency

FORM.name: Consultants
FORM.COMBOLIST: function_role Master Account Manager Consultant User

GRID.name: Staff
GRID.where: is_active=true AND function_role = 'finance_manager' AND is_active=true OR function_role = 'admin' AND is_active=true OR function_role = 'staff' AND is_active=true OR function_role = 'director'

COMBOBOX.title: Account Manager
COMBOBOX.where: is_active=true AND function_role = 'finance_manager' AND is_active=true OR function_role = 'admin' AND is_active=true OR function_role = 'staff' AND is_active=true OR function_role = 'director'

FORMVIEW.name: Account Details
FORMVIEW.gohint: Click on GO to edit your profile or manage your Accounts
